text:
Reported a session timeout problem in JBoss 4.0.3SP1 at  
http://jira.jboss.com/jira/browse/JBAS-3007 which is basically related to 
Tomcat 

Tomcat that comes by default in JBoss 4.0.3SP1 has following issue:-

HttpSession lives well beyond the specified time in {myWebApp}WEB/web.xml 
<session-timeout>1</session-timeout> . I also tried to programatically 
override it using session.setMaxInactiveInterval(60); but it is still alive 
for more than 60 secs
creator: prashanttejura@yahoo.com
pr@objektpark.de
text:
You must configure at shorter Manager processExpiresFrequency="3" default is 6 at your context.xml.

<Context>
    <Manager processExpiresFrequency="3" />
</Context>

This means that only every Engine Background threads ticks the manager control the session (default 10 
sec  You can change it with <Engine backgroundProcessorDelay="5" />). But it exist no guarantee that 
timeout comes exactly at give session maxInactiveInterval.
